name: Axe
description: A long-handled weapon with a heavy, sharp blade on one end

name: Sword
description: A Weapon with a long blade for cutting or thrusting that is often used as a symbol of honor or authority

name: Spear
description: A weapon with a long shaft and a pointed tip, typically of metal, used for thrusting or throwing.

name: Bow
description: A weapon used for shooting arrows and usually made of a strip of wood bent by a cord connecting the two ends.
